name: First Class Room
description: Experience luxury at its finest with our First Class Room. Featuring premium amenities, ocean views, and personalized service that will make your stay unforgettable.

name: Deluxe Room
description: Our Deluxe Room offers comfort and style with modern amenities. Perfect for couples or business travelers seeking a relaxing retreat.

name: Suite Room
description: Spacious Suite Room ideal for families or extended stays. Features separate living area and enhanced comfort for a home-away-from-home experience.
